AT.name: Shadow Puppeteer
AT.description: "One of the best cooperative experiences that I've ever played." - Video Chums "A welcome addition to the Wii U eShop." - Nintendo Life Entdecke mit einem Spielepartner die eigenartige, schöne Welt der Dunkelheit und des Lichts im preisgekrönten lokalen Koop-Abenteuer Shadow Puppeteer. Schlüpft in die Rollen eines Jungen und seines Schattens, die vom finsteren Schattenpuppenspieler voneinander getrennt wurden. Löst zusammen durch Beeinflussung von Licht und Schatten Rätsel, die euch dem Bösewicht näherbringen, und befreit weitere gestohlene Schatten. Shadow Puppeteer wurde mit dem Indie Prize Director’s Choice Award 2015 ausgezeichnet und zieht den Spieler von Anfang bis Ende durch die beeindruckende Gestaltung, verzaubernde Musik und raffinierten Rätsel in seinen Bann. Hauptmerkmale Single-Player-Modus und lokaler Koop-Modus Spiele Shadow Puppeteer alleine oder zusammen mit Partner, einem Familienmitglied oder Freund im Koop-Modus auf einem gemeinsamen Bildschirm. Einfache Bedienung Die Bedienung von Shadow Puppeteer ist für Wii U™-Controller optimiert und für ungeübte wie geübte Spieler gleichermaßen schnell erlernbar. Unterhaltsame Rätsel Löse durch geschicktes Lenken von Licht und Schatten raffinierte Rätsel in 2D und 3D. Stimmungsvolle Spielwelt Das atemberaubende 3D-Design und der großartige Soundtrack entführen dich in die fantastische Welt von Shadow Puppeteer. Game cannot be played with Wii Remote™. Wii Remote™ is only needed to connect other controllers.

AU.name: Shadow Puppeteer
AU.description: "One of the best cooperative experiences that I've ever played." - Video Chums "A welcome addition to the Wii U eShop." - Nintendo Life Invite a friend to explore the strange, yet beautiful world of darkness and light in Shadow Puppeteer, an award-winning, local co-op adventure. Assume the roles of a boy and his shadow, separated from one another by the evil shadow puppeteer. Work together to manipulate light, solving puzzles that bring you closer to finding this villain and freeing other shadows he has stolen. Winner of the 2015 Indie Prize Director’s Choice Award and applauded for its stunning art, enchanting music and clever puzzles, Shadow Puppeteer will captivate from beginning to end. Key Features Single Player or Local Co-Op Enjoy Shadow Puppeteer by yourself or with the company of a significant other, family member or friend in shared-screen co-op. Easy-to-Learn Controls Optimized for Wii U™ controllers, Shadow Puppeteer is easy to pick up for players of all skill levels. Entertaining Puzzles Harness the power of light to solve cleverly crafted puzzles in 2D and 3D space. Rich Atmosphere Breathtaking 3D art and an amazing soundtrack transport you to the delightful world of Shadow Puppeteer. Game cannot be played with Wii Remote™. Wii Remote™ is only needed to connect other controllers.

Rich Atmosphere Breathtaking 3D art and an amazing soundtrack transport you to the delightful world of Shadow Puppeteer. Game cannot be played with Wii Remote™. BE.name: Shadow Puppeteer
BE.description: "One of the best cooperative experiences that I've ever played." - Video Chums "A welcome addition to the Wii U eShop." - Nintendo Life Invite un copain à explorer le bizarre, mais magnifique monde d'obscurité et lumière dans Shadow Puppeteer, une adventure de récompense, locale coopérativité. Prends le rôle d'un jeunet et son ombre, partagé l'un l'autre par le Marionnettiste d'Ombre diabolique. Bosse ensemble pour manipulier la lumière, résoudre des puzzles qu'il te rapproche à trouver ce méchant et libérer les autres ombres qu'il a volés. Vainqueur de le “Indie Prize Director's Choice Award 2015” et acclamé pour son style stupéfiant, music charmante et puzzle brillant, Shadow Puppeteer il vous prened d'où debout à la fin. Principales Caractéristiques Joueur Individuel ou Local Coopération Amuse-toi avec Shadow Puppeteer ou avec un parent relevant, ou un copain en coopération sur l'écran partagé. Contrôle Simple D'apprendre Optimisé pour joystick Wii U™, Shadow Puppeteer il est facile à apprendre pour les joueurs de quiconque niveau. Puzzle Amusant Maitrise le pouvoir de la lumière pour résoudre des brillants réalisés puzzles en 2D et 3D espace. Ambiance Riche Incroyable art 3D et une bande originale extraordinaire tes transportent dans le monde séduisant de Shadow Puppeteer. Ne peut pas être joué avec la télécommande Wii. La télécommande Wii est nécessaire seulement pour connecter des autres contrôleurs.

ES.name: Shadow Puppeteer
ES.description: "One of the best cooperative experiences that I've ever played." - Video Chums "A welcome addition to the Wii U eShop." - Nintendo Life Invita a un amigo a explorar el extraño y maravilloso mundo de luz y sombras de Shadow Puppeteer, la galardonada aventura cooperativa local. Ponte en la piel de un chico y su sombra, separados por el malvado marionetistas de las sombras. Colaborad para derrotar a este maléfico villano y liberar a las demás sombras que tiene prisioneras. Ganador del 2015 Indie Prize Director’s Choice Award, Shadow Puppeteer ha encandilado a la crítica con una estética preciosa, una banda sonora cautivadora y complejos puzles que te mantendrán en vilo desde el principio al fin. Características Principales Modo en Solitario o Cooperativo Local Juega a Shadow Puppeteer en solitario o con la ayuda de un amigo o familiar, compartiendo pantalla partida. Controles Muy Fáciles de Dominarl Shadow Puppeteer está optimizado para controladores de Wii U™ y es ideal para jugadores de cualquier nivel de habilidad. Desafíos Apasionantes Usa el poder de la luz para resolver ingeniosos puzles tanto en 2D como en 3D. Atmósfera Cautivadoral El impresionante arte 3D y la evocadora banda sonora te transportarán al fabuloso mundo de Shadow Puppeteer. Game cannot be played with Wii Remote™. Wii Remote™ is only needed to connect other controllers.

IT.name: Shadow Puppeteer
IT.description: "One of the best cooperative experiences that I've ever played." - Video Chums "A welcome addition to the Wii U eShop." - Nintendo Life Invita un amico a esplorare l’incredibile e incantevole mondo di luce e tenebra. Interpretate il ruolo di un burattinaio di ombre. Collaborate per manipolare la luce, risolvendo i rompicapo che vi permetteranno di scovare il nemico e liberare le ombre di cui si è impossessato. Vincitore del 2015 Indie Prize Director’s Choice Award e acclamato per la fantastica grafica, la magnifica musica e gli ingegnosi rompicapo, Shadow Puppeteer vi rapirà dall’inizio alla fine. Funzionalità Principali Giocatore Singolo o Cooperativa Locale Gioca a Shadow Puppeteer da solo o con qualcuno di speciale, un parente o un amico in modalità cooperativa con schermo condiviso. Controlli Semplici da Imparare Ottimizzato per i controller di Wii U™, Shadow Puppeteer è per giocatori di qualsiasi livello. Rompicapo Coinvolgenti Domina il potere della luce e risolvi gli ingegnosi rompicapo 2D e 3D. Atmosfera Affascinante L’incredibile grafica 3D e l’eccezionale colonna sonora ti trasporteranno nel fantastico mondo di Shadow Puppeteer. Game cannot be played with Wii Remote™. Wii Remote™ is only needed to connect other controllers.

Contrôle Simple D'apprendre Optimisé pour joystick Wii U™, Shadow Puppeteer il est facile à apprendre pour les joueurs de quiconque niveau. Puzzle Amusant Maitrise le pouvoir de la lumière pour résoudre des brillants réalisés puzzles en 2D et 3D espace. Ambiance Riche Incroyable art 3D et une bande originale extraordinaire tes transportent dans le monde séduisant de Shadow Puppeteer. Ne peut pas être joué avec la télécommande Wii. La télécommande Wii est nécessaire seulement pour connecter des autres contrôleurs.

MT.name: Shadow Puppeteer
MT.description: "One of the best cooperative experiences that I've ever played." - Video Chums "A welcome addition to the Wii U eShop." - Nintendo Life Invite a friend to explore the strange, yet beautiful world of darkness and light in Shadow Puppeteer, an award-winning, local co-op adventure. Assume the roles of a boy and his shadow, separated from one another by the evil shadow puppeteer. Work together to manipulate light, solving puzzles that bring you closer to finding this villain and freeing other shadows he has stolen. Winner of the 2015 Indie Prize Director’s Choice Award and applauded for its stunning art, enchanting music and clever puzzles, Shadow Puppeteer will captivate from beginning to end. Key Features Single Player or Local Co-Op Enjoy Shadow Puppeteer by yourself or with the company of a significant other, family member or friend in shared-screen co-op. Easy-to-Learn Controls Optimized for Wii U™ controllers, Shadow Puppeteer is easy to pick up for players of all skill levels. Entertaining Puzzles Harness the power of light to solve cleverly crafted puzzles in 2D and 3D space. Rich Atmosphere Breathtaking 3D art and an amazing soundtrack transport you to the delightful world of Shadow Puppeteer. Game cannot be played with Wii Remote™. Wii Remote™ is only needed to connect other controllers.

PT.name: Shadow Puppeteer
PT.description: "One of the best cooperative experiences that I've ever played." - Video Chums "A welcome addition to the Wii U eShop." - Nintendo Life Convide um amigo a descobrir o intrigante e maravilhoso mundo de luz e sombra de Shadow Puppeteer, um premiado jogo de aventura para curtir em cooperação local. Assumam o papel de um menino e sua sombra que foram separados um do outro pelo malvado Shadow Puppeteer. Trabalhem em parceria manipulando as fontes de luz para resolver os enigmáticos quebra-cabeças que ajudarão a encontrar o vilão e a libertar outras sombras capturadas por ele. Escolhido o ganhador do 2015 Indie Prize Director’s Choice Award e aclamado por apresentar uns gráficos deslumbrantes, uma fascinante trilha sonora e engenhosos quebra-cabeças, Shadow Puppeteer cativa do início ao fim. Características Principais Para Jogar em Modo Individual ou em Cooperação Local Divirta-se com o Shadow Puppeteer, sozinho ou formando uma magnífica parceria com um familiar ou amigo, no modo de cooperação com tela dividida. Comandos de Fácil Aprendizagem Otimizado para os controles da Wii U™, Shadow Puppeteer é um jogo fácil de aprender para jogadores de todos os níveis de habilidade. Divertidos Quebra-Cabeças Aproveite as fontes de luz para resolver os quebra-cabeças mais engenhosos em dimensões 2D e 3D. Dimensão Envolvente Os deslumbrantes gráficos em 3D e a fabulosa trilha sonora transportarão você ao fascinante mundo de Shadow Puppeteer. Game cannot be played with Wii Remote™. Wii Remote™ is only needed to connect other controllers.

RU.name: Shadow Puppeteer
RU.description: "One of the best cooperative experiences that I've ever played." - Video Chums "A welcome addition to the Wii U eShop." - Nintendo Life Пригласи друзей и открой мир света и тьмы в приключенческой игре Shadow Puppeteer. Завоевавшая премии игра предоставляет возможность нескольких игроков по локальной сети. Злой похититель теней Shadow Puppeteer украл твою тень, и твоя задача – воссоединиться с ней. Разгадка пазлов приведет тебя к логову злодея, изначально похитившего твою тень. На пути ты будешь освобождать других жертв злого Shadow Puppeteer. Игра завоевала награду 2015 Indie Prize Director’s Choice Award. Shadow Puppeteer поразит тебя графикой, музыкой и интересными заданиями! Ключевые функции Режим одиночной игры или нескольких игроков по локальной сети. В игре Shadow Puppeteer может участвовать один или несколько игроков по локальной сети. Легко использовать панель управления. Игра Shadow Puppeteer оптимизирована для Wii U и интересна для игроков всех уровней. Занимательные пазлы. Управляя энергией света, разгадывай пазлы в 2D и 3D. Притягивающая атмосфера. Захватывающая графика 3D и незабываемый саундтрек унесут тебя в мир Shadow Puppeteer. Game cannot be played with Wii Remote™. Wii Remote™ is only needed to connect other controllers.
